text: 5.10 Jon 17.15, 1 Ko 1.20, 10.27 Nɨb pen binɨb bin si bɨ si gɨpal okok, binɨb tap chɨn ke kuŋay yɨbɨl dun agɨl nepal okok, binɨb tap si dɨpal okok, binɨb tap yepɨs sɨbog ñɨbal okok, binɨb lum awl anɨb okok ayɨp jɨmñɨl ma yenɨmɨb agɨl, takaw anɨb ak nɨbop ma agebin. Mel yɨbɨl. Lum awl mɨdupsek mɨdebal tek, kɨlop kelɨgɨnɨmɨb tek ma lup.
